iterations.description: When switching between connection tabs, the connection tree should auto-select the corresponding node for better navigation UX.

notes:
AI triage (claude): When switching between connection tabs, the connection tree should auto-select the corresponding node for better navigation UX.
Approach: Subscribe to the active tab changed event in ConnectionTreeWindow and call tree.SelectNode() with the matching ConnectionInfo node when the active connection changes.
